modName: Discreet Jewelry - Invisible Rings and Amulets
summary: Adds craftable jewelry that does not appear on the character to let you enjoy the benefits of your enchanting skill without ugly clipping between your armor and jewelry.
descriptionHtml: Adds craftable jewelry that does not appear on the character to let you enjoy the benefits of your enchanting skill without ugly clipping between your armor and jewelry. The items are called Discreet Ring and Discreet Necklace, their stats are identical to Gold Diamond Ring and Gold Diamond Necklace. The ring and necklace are converted from their Gold Diamond counterparts at a forge.
author: spiderexpert

files.name: Version 1.1
files.changelogHtml: To make the mod more balanced when used with crafting overhaul mods, changed recipes to require a gold diamond ring/necklace to craft a discreet ring/necklace instead of a gold ingot and a diamond/flawless diamond.

files.name: Version 1.2
files.changelogHtml: Items now occupy ring and amulet slots and instead lack a model, so you don't have to worry about unequipping them when equipping other rings and amulets.
